remarks: Extend a finite group sum by padding outside with zeroes. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.)  (Revised by AV, 3-Jun-2019.)
statement:
gsumcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumcl.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumcl.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
gsumcl.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumcl.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsumres.s $e |- ( ph -> ( F supp .0. ) C_ W ) $.
gsumres.w $e |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) $.
gsumres $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( F |` W ) ) = ( G gsum F ) ) $.
